sentences.en: You're always a major leaguer in my eyes.
sentences.cn: 你永远是大联盟在我的眼睛。

sentences.en: TH Leaguer has very strong Research and Development team.
sentences.cn: 本公司拥有强大的研发队伍。

sentences.en: She wasn't your typical ivy leaguer. [DiLosa] really taught her the ropes.
sentences.cn: 她不是典型的常春藤联盟名校生。狄罗萨教了她一些真本事。
